businessBlurbShort: Snappy tag line followed by, Contact Us Today!
supportingHeading: Shields Bros Panel & Paint has been serving the WNY area since 1959 and is a family-owned and operated business with three generations of auto body repair experts. We provide a one-stop shop for any vehicle: auto body, paint services, fabrication & more. We offer one of the best warranties in the industry with a Lifetime Guarantee on all paint work!
secondaryContent1: Tell them about your staff member, their background and what is it about them that can provide excellent service that the customer will be sure to return for.
p3Content1: Cant make it out to one of our many stores? We will deliver your goods free of charge, we have a special inhouse team so you dont need to worry about your precious new purchase being tossed around in a FedEx van
titleBlurb: Professional auto body body and paint services
titleContent: Got a bit banged up after cruising over to the missys after a few? Chur we'll sort you out cuhz
businessBlurb: Snappy tag line followed by, Contact Us Today!
contactBlurb: If you are interested at all in any of the services we provide, get in contact with us and we will do our best to help you out.
secondaryContent: Shields Bros Panel & Paint is a family-owned and operated business that has been serving Western New York for over 50 years. We are passionate about our customers and our community and we are experienced in all aspects of the painting trade.Shields Bros Panel & Paint is a family-owned and operated business that has been serving Western New York for over 50 years. We are passionate about our customers and our community, as well as being experienced in all aspects of the painting trade.
